attributes.action: To stop the royal family from using tax payers money to pay for their own housing and pleasures
attributes.additional_details: I am creating this E-petition regarding the recent announcement of £4million of tax payers money that is being used to refurbish royal households i fail to understand why the royal family is aloud to use tax payers money for there own benefit as i keep hearing in the news about budget cuts in the NHS because of the lack of funding and hearing that £4million is being spent on the royals has made me furious because it does not benefit the public what so ever i really would like for the british government to stop this theft of tax payers money and make it illegal for the royals to spend any money from tax on themselves as i believe that this is nothing but theft in disguise
